Package nzilbb.ag.serialize

Class SerializationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • nzilbb.ag.serialize.SerializationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class SerializationException
extends Exception
    Thrown when GraphDeserializer.deserialize() could not complete due to fatal errors.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getErrors

        public LinkedHashMap<SerializationException.ErrorType,​String> getErrors()
        Getter for errors: Collection of fatal errors that occurred during deserialization. The key is the error type, and the value is a displayable description of the error.
        Returns:
        Collection of fatal errors that occurred during deserialization. The key is the error type, and the value is a displayable description of the error.

      • setErrors

        public SerializationException setErrors​(LinkedHashMap<SerializationException.ErrorType,​String> newErrors)
        Setter for errors: Collection of fatal errors that occurred during deserialization. The key is the error type, and the value is a displayable description of the error.
        Parameters:
        newErrors - Collection of fatal errors that occurred during deserialization. The key is the error type, and the value is a displayable description of the error.

      • addError

        public void addError​(SerializationException.ErrorType type,
                     String description)
        Adds an error. If the given type of error has already been added, the description is appended to the existing description.
        Parameters:
        type - The error type.
        description - The error's description.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Represents the exception with all its errors as a String.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Throwable
        Returns:
        A String representation of the exception with all its errors.
